command.relevant: if(count(instance('commcaresession')/session/user/data/release_2) > 0, instance('commcaresession')/session/user/data/release_2, "Off") = "On" and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/soft_close != "yes" and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/gender = "female" and int((today() - date(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/dob)) div 365.25) >= 10 and int((today() - date(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/dob)) div 365.25) <= 49

if(count(instance('commcaresession')/session/user/data/release_2) > 0, instance('commcaresession')/session/user/data/release_2, "Off") = "On" and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/soft_close != "yes" and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/gender = "female" and int((today() - date(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/dob)) div 365.25) >= 10 and int((today() - date(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/dob)) div 365.25) <= 49 and today() >= date(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/fp_reporting_date)

if(count(instance('commcaresession')/session/user/data/release_2) > 0, instance('commcaresession')/session/user/data/release_2, "Off") = "On" and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/soft_close != "yes" and ( instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/gender = "female" and int((today() - date(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/dob)) div 365.25) >= 15 and int((today() - date(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id=instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id_load_client_1]/dob)) div 365.25) <= 49)
